borrow.title: Borrowing
borrow.subtitle: Laboratory Items
borrow.rules_title: Rules of Procedure for Borrowing Items
borrow.rules_1: The maximum duration of borrowing is 7 days. Late returns will be fined Rp20,000/day.
borrow.rules_2: Items are required to be returned in good condition. If there is damage, it is mandatory to replace 50% of the price of the item.
borrow.rules_3: Lost items must be replaced with similar items.
